additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Each 15mL of product contains: Fritillaria cirrhosa 179mg, Eriobotrya japonica 41mg, Adenophora triphylla 6mg, Wolfiporia cocos 6mg, Citrus maxima 25mg, Platycodon grandiflorus 15mg, Pinellia ternata 6mg, Schisandra chinensis 1mg, Trichosanthes kirilowii 6mg, Polygala sibirica 25mg, Zingiber officinale (Fresh) 6mg, Glycyrrhiza glabra 164mg

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: CAUTIONS: 1. Pregnant or likely to become pregnant women are advised to consult doctor before taking. 2. Adults and children over 12 years of age only. 3. Not suitable for infants under the age of 12 months. 4. This product contains sugars. 5. If coughing and other symptoms persist, or temperature exceeds 38 degree Celcius, consult your doctor or healthcare professional.

description: Made from Chinese herbs and honey, Nin Jiom Pei Pa Koa is a traditional Chinese medicine from Hong Kong which soothes sore throat and relieves cough. It has a long-standing reputation amongst many Asian families.
name: Honey Extract
